## v1.5.3 - B
**FIXES**
- Fixed the issue where Routes were not read when creating formula requests
- Fixed the issue Approving and Rejecting formula requests not working
- Fixed the issue where the formula data is not sent to the Actual Formulas after approval
- Fixed the issue where Submitting Formulas do not work when there are Two Main Components(ie. Lecture + Laboratory Structure Types)
- Fixed improper display of values (Flat Values instead of the intended percentage heirarchical values)


**CHANGES**
- Removed the Departments Change as it is moved to the Formulas Section in the Grades Formula.
- Removed the Departments tab as its main functions were moved to the Formulas section.
